department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Fiona Storm Damage wharf and breakwater reconstruction at Blue Beach, NL
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of DFO has a requirement for the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material for Fiona Storm Damage wharf and breakwater reconstruction at Blue Beach, NL, in strict accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings, and subject to all terms and conditions of the Contract. The estimated cost for this opportunity is within the following cost category: between $5,000,001 to $20,000,000 (HST included). Bid security will be a requirement during Phase 2.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement

### ITQ: Fiona Storm Damage Wharf and Breakwater Reconstruction at Blue Beach, NL

#### Reference Number: WS4679097078

#### Solicitation Number: WS4679097078

#### Publication Date: July 10, 2024

#### Tender Closing Date: July 31, 2024, 2:00 PM AST

### Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking tenders for the reconstruction of the damaged wharf and breakwater at Blue Beach, NL, following the Fiona storm damage.

**Tender Details:**

* **Solicited Goods and Services:** Marine construction services
* **Estimated Cost:** Between $5,000,001 and $20,000,000 (HST included)
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
* **Regions of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador

**Contract Information:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 Canada

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Gary Bryant (PWGSC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Access the Notice:**

To view the tender notice and download any supporting documents, please access the Public Works and Government Services Canada Contracting System through the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20280058](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20280058)

Note: the rewritten output was revised to fit within the 400-word limit. Some minor content modifications were made to improve grammar, punctuation and clarity of the original message.
